articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: ‘Shame on you’: Bill Gates, Microsoft bosses face pro-Palestine protest at company's 50th anniversary event | WATCH - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Microsoft employees protested against AI's role in Israeli military actions in Gaza, claiming the tech giant supports genocide. | World News
articles.content: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman's presentation was interrupted by employees' pro-Palestinian protest at company's 50th anniversary celebration on Friday in the latest backlash over the tech industr… [+3152 chars]

articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: Midjourney introduces first new image generation model in over a year - Ars Technica
articles.description: The new model is now in public alpha and has personalization enabled by default.

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Microsoft turns 50 today, and it made me think about MS-DOS 5.0 - Ars Technica
articles.description: A story about an obsolete PC, an old library book, and a one version of MS-DOS.
